img_summary: The image depicts two characters walking through a shallow body of water. The character on the left is wearing a long, flowing robe and a wide-brimmed hat, while the character on the right is dressed in darker attire with intricate designs and also wears a wide-brimmed hat. The scene is set in a misty environment with a large, ornate structure visible in the distance, resembling a pagoda or temple. The sky is overcast, adding to the mysterious and atmospheric setting.
